frontmatter.title: Jimmy Wales, Wikimedia Foundation
frontmatter.subtitle: Presented by the Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure at UMass Amherst
frontmatter.author: Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure
frontmatter.excerpt: Wikipedia founder Jimmy Wales joins us for a thrilling chat about what we can learn from social media and whatâ€™s anti-social about a lot of social media today. Jimmy has recently launched the the social network WT.Social, designed to as a non-addictive, thoughtful online space, and has lots of thoughts about the type of communities that we might be able to start cultivating online.
